fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Business and Industry, Taxation, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, External Relations, Public Health, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: Tracking and Tracing of exciseable products, Tracking and Tracing of non-exciseable products to protect consumers from the consequences of illicit trade, counterfeit products and falsified medecines
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
• INEXTO’s mission is to offer cutting edge serialization, authentication and track & trace solutions to support clients in securing their supply chain, for more transparency, safety and ethics in trade flows 
• INEXTO provides, in response to regulatory requirements, industrial, cost effective solutions compliant with open standards
